channel.title: Welcome on Patrick Weygoldt
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome on Patrick Weygoldt

item.title: PlatformIO - Lazy hardware development from the command line.
item.description: An introduction to PlatformIO, an open-source tool that makes software development for microcontroller prototyping platforms more convenient.
